155.plot: Straight Talk with actress Garcelle Beauvais, singer Kimberly Caldwell and Olympian Summer Sanders; Steve helps one of his producers learn her roots; chef Lawrence Page makes sweet potato pie;

156.title: Tom Bergeron/Cali Champion, Dr. V & Alesha Renee
156.plot: Tom Bergeron ("Dancing with the Stars"); panelists Cari Champion, Dr. V and Alesha Reese; a group of women who went from sharecropping to home owning;

157.title: Roma Downey/Diann Valentine, Krystal Bee & Ta'Rhonda Jones
157.plot: Author Roma Downey ("Box of Butterflies"); panelists Diann Valentine, Krystal Bee and Ta'Rhonda Jones; an 8-year-old hockey player;

158.title: Bridget Kelly, Garcelle Beauvais & Dr. V
158.plot: Straight Talk panelists Bridget Kelly, Garcelle Beauvais and Dr. V; 6-year-old Ariana ("Little Big Shots");

159.title: Eileen Davidson/Steve Leder
159.plot: Eileen Davidson (The Young and the Restless (1973)); rabbi Steve Leder (book, "More Beautiful Than Before"); panelists Julissa Bermudez, Ashanti, and Christmas Abbott discuss dating and relationships; a 6-year-old pro surfer;

160.title: Tiffanie Davis Henry, Siggy Flicker, Gizelle Bryant
160.plot: Panelists Dr. Tiffanie Davis Henry, Siggy Flicker and Gizelle Bryant discuss love, dating, relationships and parenting; A.D. Dolphin returns to discuss the Dherbs Full Body Cleanse and to help a woman lose weight;

161.title: Jocko Sims/Tracey Edmonds, Dorit Kemsley & Carrie Ann Inaba
161.plot: Actor Jocko Sims (The Last Ship (2014)); panelists Tracey Edmonds, Dorit Kemsley and Carrie Ann Inaba discuss relationships;

162.title: Ian Smith/Keri Hilson, Brooke Burke & Amber Stevens-West
162.plot: Dr. Ian Smith (book, "The Clean 20"); panelists Keri Hilson, Brooke Burke, and Amber Stevens West answer love and relationship questions; card tricks;

163.title: Penn & Teller/Kevin O'Leary/James Sexton
163.plot: Penn and Teller (Penn & Teller: Fool Us (2011)); Kevin O'Leary (Shark Tank (2009)); divorce lawyer James J. Sexton answers tough relationship questions;

164.title: Danica McKellar/Diann Valentine, Kimberly Caldwell-Harvey & Tiffanie Davis Henry
164.plot: Actress Danica McKellar (books "Do Not Open This Math Book" and "Bathtime Mathtime"); panelists Diann Valentine, Kimberly Caldwell-Harvey and Dr. Tiffanie Davis Henry discuss relationships; Steve helps a terminally ill child complete his bucket list;

165.title: Jon Taffer/Habib Sadeghi
165.plot: TV personality Jon Taffer (book, "Don't Bullsh*t Yourself"); Dr. Habib Sadeghi (book, "The Clarity Cleanse"); a little girl who loves bugs;

166.title: Boy George/Heather Dubrow/Terry Dubrow
166.plot: Singer Boy George promotes his Las Vegas residency; Heather and Terry Dubrow ("Dr. and Mrs. Guinea Pig" podcast);

167.title: Julianne Hough & Brooks Laich/Kim Gravel, Masika Kalysha & Carolina Guerra
167.plot: Julianne Hough and Brooks Laich; panelists Kim Gravel, Masika Kalysha and Carolina Guerra;

168.title: Jerry Springer/Kym Whitley
168.plot: Talk-show host Jerry Springer (Jerry Springer (1991)); Kym Whitley (Young & Hungry (2014));

170.title: Dr. Drew Pinsky/Tommy Davidson
170.plot: TV personality Dr. Drew Pinsky; actor Tommy Davidson (Vacation Creation (2016));

171.title: Greg Mathis/T-Boz
171.plot: Greg Mathis (Judge Mathis (1998)); Tionne 'T-Boz' Watkins T-Boz (book, "A Sick Life");

173.title: Patti Stanger/Carolina Guerra
173.plot: Patti Stanger (The Millionaire Matchmaker (2008)); actress Carolina Guerra (Animal Kingdom (2016));

174.title: Episode #1.174
174.plot: Steve puts two chefs to the test; Anne Burrell is the judge;

176.title: Steve's Favorite Couples
176.plot: Jenny McCarthy (Sirius XM's "The Jenny McCarthy Show") and Donnie Wahlberg ("Blue Bloods"); Eric Christian Olsen ("NCIS Los Angeles") and Sarah Wright Olsen;

177.title: Steve's Favorite Real People
177.plot: Steve and Honey Bunches of Oats surprise Diana Hunter; sisters Mollie and Madison survive a carjacking attempt;

178.title: Steve's Favorite Kids
178.plot: The cast of "Young Shelton" has no idea what things from the 1980s are; Javon, the 11-year-old "Future Floyd Mayweather" gets advice from Mike Tyson;

179.title: Steve's Favorite Straight Talk
179.plot: A Straight Talk panel discussion outing an affair; a Straight Talk panel discussion risking it all to go under the knife;

180.title: Steve's Favorite Unbelievable People
180.plot: Psychic medium Reginald Lewis reads actress Kym Whitley with a presence from her mom; viral street magician Julius Dein wows the audience;

locations: Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
imdb.title: Steve
plot: After ending his Chicago-based show, '_Steve_ (qv) Harvey' (qv) heads to Los Angeles to host a new weekday syndicated program aiming to bring a late night atmosphere to the afternoon.
